message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's true value to you is $1,200,000. I'm looking forward to hearing back from you!

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get a better price. Considering the value of the product to me, and your own valuation, I'd be willing to pay $1,050,000.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a better price, but I'm still not willing to go below $1,120,000. Considering the product's value to you and my own valuation, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,080,000. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
